pages.text: $(item)Dense Quartz Ore$() is found in the lower reaches of $(thing)The Nether$() and is the purest naturally occurring quartz.$(p)$(info) The large $(item)Dense Quartz Ore$() block can be collected using $(thing)Silk Touch$().$(p)$(info) Requires an $(thing)Iron-Tier Pickaxe$() to harvest.
